Slăbește sănătos! Ceaiurile AllSlim sunt: Lose weight healthily! AllSlim teas are 100% natural products whose composition includes herbs and dehydrated fruits that are particularly effective in the fight against weight gain. Teas contribute to the elimination of water and toxins from the body, contribute quickly and safely to the burning of excess fat and thus cellulite and to the inhibition of appetite. They also have an antioxidant, invigorating, energizing effect and reduce the occurrence of respiratory and heart diseases. The taste is slightly aromatic and does not require sweetening due to the fruits in the mixture.
